fr.uv1.bd

Class CompetitorsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uv1.bd.CompetitorsManager

  • public class CompetitorsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO class (Data Access Object) for the Competitor interface. This class provides the CRUD functionalities :
    • C: create a new competitor in the database.
    • R: retrieve (or read) a (list of)competitor(s) in the database.
    • U: update the values stored in the database for a competitor.
    • D: delete a competitor in the database.
    Author:
    THIAM Mariam

    • Method Detail

      • persist

        public static Competitor persist(Competitor competitor)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                 BadParametersException
        Store a competitor in the database. This competitor is not stored yet, so his id value is NULL. Once the competitor is stored, the method returns the competitor with the id value setted.
        Parameters:
        competitor - the competitor to be stored.
        Returns:
        the competitor with the updated value for the id.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        BadParametersException

      • findById

        public static Competitor findById(long id)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                  BadParametersException
        Find a competitor by his id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the competitor to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the competitor or null if the id does not exist in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        BadParametersException

      • findAll

        public static java.util.List<Competitor> findAll()
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                 BadParametersException
        Find all the subscribers in the database.
        Returns:
        the list of competitors
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        BadParametersException

      • findByName

        public static long findByName(Person p)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              BadParametersException
        Find a person's id using his firstnam, lastname and borndate.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the competitor to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the person's id or 0 if it does not exist in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        BadParametersException
